description: Creates an Amazon Web Services resource for an on-premises storage system that you want DataSync Discovery to collect information about.

parameters.name: ServerConfiguration
parameters.description: Specifies the server name and network port required to connect with the management interface of your on-premises storage system. The domain name or IP address of your storage system's management interface. ServerPort (integer) --- The network port for accessing the storage system's management interface.

nested_params.name: ServerHostname
nested_params.description: The domain name or IP address of your storage system's management interface.

nested_params.name: ServerPort
nested_params.description: The network port for accessing the storage system's management interface.

parameters.name: SystemType
parameters.description: Specifies the type of on-premises storage system that you want DataSync Discovery to collect information about.

parameters.name: AgentArns
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DataSync agent that connects to and reads from your on-premises storage system's management interface. You can only specify one ARN. (string) ---

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Specifies labels that help you categorize, filter, and search for your Amazon Web Services resources. We recommend creating at least a name tag for your on-premises storage system. (dict) --- A key-value pair representing a single tag that's been applied to an Amazon Web Services resource. The key for an Amazon Web Services resource tag. Value (string) --- The value for an Amazon Web Services resource tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key for an Amazon Web Services resource tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value for an Amazon Web Services resource tag.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Specifies a client token to make sure requests with this API operation are idempotent. If you don't specify a client token, DataSync generates one for you automatically. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Credentials
parameters.description: Specifies the user name and password for accessing your on-premises storage system's management interface. Specifies the user name for your storage system's management interface. Specifies the password for your storage system's management interface.

nested_params.name: Username
nested_params.description: Specifies the user name for your storage system's management interface.

nested_params.name: Password
nested_params.description: Specifies the password for your storage system's management interface.

nested_items.name: StorageSystemArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the on-premises storage system that you can use with DataSync Discovery.
